austere.translation[0].definitions[0].de: plain and simple and without any decoration
austere.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who is austere is very strict and serious – used to show disapproval
austere.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Her father is a very austere man.
austere.translation[0].definitions[2].de: an austere way of life is very simple and has few things to make it comfortable or enjoyable
austere.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Cuthbert led an austere life of prayer and solitude.
